Package command.toserver

package command.toserver
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActivateLeaderCardCommand
    Command to notify the server about the client's intention to activate a leader effect
    ChatMessageClientCommand
    This command is used to notify the Server of the Client's chat message
    ChosenLeaderCardCommand
    This command notifies the Server about the leader card choice made by one client
    ChosenPrivilegeCommand
    this command represents the Client's choice about the possible resources given by a council privilege
    ChurchSupportCommand
    this command represents the Client's answer about the possible decision to pay to prevent excommunication true if you want to support, false otherwise
    ClientToServerCommand
    This abstract class represents a generic command that a client needs to submit to the server
    DiscardLeaderCardCommand
    this command manages the possibility to discard a leader card during the game.
    FinishRoundCommand
    This class alerts the server about the end of a turn
    HarvestCommand
    This class manages the client decision to make a harvest action
    InvalidInputCommand
    This class is made to alert the server about an invalid action made by the client
    PlaceIntoCouncilPalaceCommand
    the Client uses this command to place a pawn in the council palace
    PlaceIntoMarketCommand
    the command used to place a pawn into one of the market areas
    PlayerMoveCommand
    The class to notify the server about the client's move
    ProductionActivationCommand
    This command is sent when the user has already chosen between the various resource exchange effects that the cards he owns have.
    ProductionCommand
    This command was needed to treat in a different way the production and its relative resource exchange choices.
    ReconnectionAnswerCommand
    Reconnection answer from the client: provides answer, username, password
    RequestClosureCommand
    the command to ask the server to close the connection
    SatanChoiceCommand
    Command that notifies the Satan's choice
    SendCredentialsCommand
    This class represents the message with client credentials received by server
    TakeCardCommand
    the client uses this command to take a card from the game board and to place a pawn in the related floor
